text: naega iseula-el-ui jasondeulgwa seong-yag-eul maej-eoss-euni geudaedeul-eun ojig hananimman-eul gyeongbaehala. geuligo bumonimkke hyodohago chincheoggwa goadeul-wa bul-uhan jadeul-ege chinjeolhal geos-imyeo salamdeul-ege hullyunghan mal-eul hago kkujunhi yebaeleul deulimyeo uimu huisageum-eul naedolog hala. geu hue geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul jung-ui sosuleul je-oehagoneun deung-eul dollimyeo dol-aseossnola
